net.gotev.hostmonitor

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.gotev.hostmonitor.Logger

  • public class Logger
extends Object
    HostMonitor library logger. You can provide your own logger delegate implementation, to be able to log in a different way. By default the log level is set to DEBUG when the build type is debug, and OFF in release. The default logger implementation logs in Android's LogCat.
